name: Satish Tripathi
bio: Satish Tripathi is an accomplished academic administrator and computer scientist.
He served as the president of the University at Buffalo (UB), State University of New York from 2011 to 2024.
Tripathi is known for his expertise in applying pattern recognition to solve problems in medical imaging, bioinformatics, and chemoinformatics.
He is the first international-born president in UB's history.
Satish Tripathi is a member of the Board of Directors at Tata Sons.
lore: Tripathi received a Ph.D. in computer science from the University of Toronto.
Prior to becoming president, he served as UB's provost and executive vice president for academic affairs from 2004 to 2011.
He has published over 200 scholarly papers and holds several patents.
Tripathi is a fellow of the IEEE and the American Association for the Advancement of Science.
He is committed to promoting diversity and inclusion in higher education and has spearheaded numerous initiatives to support underrepresented students.
